mapper.select: SELECT answer_id AS userId, COUNT(*) AS answerCnt, MAX(id) AS maxScoreAnswerPaperId, MAX(score) AS answerMaxScore, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY MAX(score) DESC) AS answerMaxScoreRank FROM r_answer_paper WHERE answer_status = 2 -- 只统计已完成状态 AND complete_time between #｛startTime｝ and #｛endTime｝ GROUP BY answer_id ORDER BY answerMaxScore DESC

SELECT examiner_id AS userId, COUNT(*) AS examCnt, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS examCntRank, exam_paper_id AS hotExamPaperId FROM r_answer_paper WHERE answer_status = 2 -- 只统计已完成状态 AND complete_time between #｛startTime｝ and #｛endTime｝ GROUP BY examiner_id ORDER BY examCnt DESC
